type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="592" w="550">Grass Spread procedure template created by Wes a.k.a Millu a.k.a HidanThis procedure allows your block to spread like vanilla grassit includes 4 directions along with 3 levelsAbove blockSame level as blockBelow BlockKeep in mind that grass blocks need to be min and max 1 block away from our dirt block "Note: Placing Grass block directly 1 block above or below will not gonna work!"Place your grass blocks in empty slotsSimple example where blocks will be searchedX = Grass BlockZ = Dirt BlockQ = Any other blockA = Aur BlockX/Z
